definitions.definition: A person who enters an agreement with a land owner to farm the land and then pay a portion (share) of the produce as rent ; one who sharecrops .
A fiction book set in a fictional universe created by a different author , typically produced under licence .

main_definition: A person who enters an agreement with a land owner to farm the land and then pay a portion (share) of the produce as rent ; one who sharecrops .
secondary_definitions: ( publishing , attributive ) A fiction book set in a fictional universe created by a different author , typically produced under licence .
